snippet: Several populations of Atlantic sturgeon, the large, primordial-looking fish that were once common along East Coast watersheds, are endangered, the National Marine Fisheries Service declared Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Several populations of Atlantic sturgeon, the large, primordial-looking fish that were once common along East Coast watersheds, are endangered, the National Marine Fisheries Service declared Tuesday.

headline.main: Delaware: Some Sturgeon Declared to Be Endangered
headline.print_headline: Delaware: Some Sturgeon Declared To Be Endangered
